selectedVerses.text: And the battle continued that day, and the king was propped up in his chariot facing the Syrians, until at evening he died. And the blood of the wound flowed into the bottom of the chariot.
They have healed the wound of my people lightly, saying, 'Peace, peace,' when there is no peace.
It exercises all the authority of the first beast in its presence, and makes the earth and its inhabitants worship the first beast, whose mortal wound was healed.

And it became broader as it wound upward to the side chambers, because the temple was enclosed upward all around the temple. Thus the temple had a broad area upward, and so one went up from the lowest story to the top story through the middle story.
For the power of the horses is in their mouths and in their tails, for their tails are like serpents with heads, and by means of them they wound.
